url.title: URL
url.description: Category or product page URL to start crawling

productLinkSelector.title: Product Link Selector
productLinkSelector.description: CSS selector for product links (e.g., '.list-item-img a')

productLinkIncludePatterns.title: Product Link Include Patterns
productLinkIncludePatterns.description: URL patterns that product links MUST include (e.g., ['gach-'])

productLinkExcludePatterns.title: Product Link Exclude Patterns
productLinkExcludePatterns.description: URL patterns to exclude from product links (e.g., ['gioi-thieu', 'tin-tuc'])

titleClass.title: Title Selector
titleClass.description: CSS selector for product title (e.g., '.product-detail_title h1')

skuClass.title: SKU Selector
skuClass.description: CSS selector for product SKU (leave empty for auto-generate)

contentClass.title: Content Selector
contentClass.description: CSS selector for product content HTML (e.g., '.product-description')

thumbnailClass.title: Thumbnail Selector
thumbnailClass.description: CSS selector for product thumbnail (e.g., '.image-slider-item img')

imagesClass.title: Images Selector
imagesClass.description: CSS selector for product images (e.g., '.swiper-slide img')

includePatterns.title: Include Patterns
includePatterns.description: URL patterns to include images (leave empty for all)

skuInImage.title: SKU in Image
skuInImage.description: Only include images containing SKU in URL

autoGenerateSku.title: Auto Generate SKU
autoGenerateSku.description: Automatically generate SKU if not found on page

isPrice.title: Price Required
isPrice.description: Skip products without price (true = skip, false = include all)

isThumbnail.title: Thumbnail Required
isThumbnail.description: Skip products without thumbnail (true = skip, false = include all)

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max Requests per Crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of requests that can be made by this crawler

maxProductLinks.title: Max Product Links
maxProductLinks.description: Maximum number of product links to collect (for recursive API crawling)

isBrowser.title: Use Browser API
isBrowser.description: Use external API for product link discovery (true = API, false = direct crawl)
